{"blocks":[{"key":"fvh5g","text":"Preparation of electrocompetent cells 
Weinstock paper:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":37,"style":"bold"},{"offset":0,"length":37,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hieg","text":"Matthew T Weinstock, Eric D Hesek,Christopher M Wilson, Daniel G Gibson","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"key":0},{"offset":21,"length":12,"key":1},{"offset":34,"length":20,"key":2},{"offset":56,"length":15,"key":3}],"data":{}},{"key":"7pl6t","text":"Vibrio natriegens as a fast-growing host for molecular biology
Nature Methods volume 13, pages 849–851 (2016)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":17,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3e2al","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1q7cf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6v5l5","text":"To prepare the day before:

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59t72","text":"-LB I media  +V2 salts (204 mM NaCl, 4.2 mM KCl, 23.14mM MgCl2 )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2fbr4","text":"-electroporation buffer (680 mM sucrose, 7 mM K2HPO4, pH 7) ( sterile filtrated)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":54,"length":4,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2c36g","text":"-over night culture of  V.n from the cryo-stock in LBI + v2 salts (37 °C ; at 200 r.p.m)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2j5ru","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30hf","text":"Preparing culture :","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"bold"},{"offset":0,"length":19,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eu5t4","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cucdq","text":"Depending on how many aliquds you want to have, incubate media with your overnight culture for a starting OD of 0.05.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtj10","text":"The culture is grown at 37 °C in a baffled flask, shaking at 200 r.p.m. until an OD600 between 0.5 to 0.8 is reached.
*be careful when they reach an OD near 0.1, V. natriegensis very fast growing,  so start measuring in shorter time periods.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":162,"length":13,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"q79l","text":"Prechill the electroporation buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ta41","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4596","text":"Washing:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":8,"style":"bold"},{"offset":0,"length":8,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1h29","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am1ic","text":"From here on try always to keep your culture on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nmhq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6167r","text":"-The culture is then put on ice for 15 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4f3f","text":" ( the original Protocol sais to directly fill them into your prechilled centrifugatin  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7gfp","text":"  containments )","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7vc8","text":"-The cells are pelleted at 3000x g. for 20 min at 4 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddvd0","text":"-The supernatant is carefully decanted and the cell pellets are gently suspended in 10mL
 of chilled electroporation buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":93,"length":7,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84s2s","text":"-The suspensions are transferred to a chilled50mL falcon tube and the tube is filled top
 with additional chilled electroporation buffer (50mL) and inverted several times. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":38,"length":7,"style":"bold"},{"offset":106,"length":7,"style":"bold"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"837bl","text":"-The cells are centrifuged down at 3000x g  for 15 min at 4 °C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1nefn","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1e39","text":"-The wash is repeated two times for a total of three washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7daod","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fb0n","text":"Aliquotation:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":13,"style":"bold"},{"offset":0,"length":13,"style":"UNDERLINE"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tbsf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qrdr","text":"After the final wash, the supernant is carefully decanted the cells are gently resuspended in residual electroporation buffer. 
Measure the OD in a  1/20 dilution against electroporation buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmv2t","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ma9m","text":"The volume is adjusted with additional electroporation buffer to bring the final OD600 to 16.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tiip","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apuu0","text":"The Cells are aliquoted ( 80µL ) into chilled 1.5µL centrifugation tubes, directly frozen in liquid nitrogen and stored at −80 °C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/nmeth.3970#auth-1"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/nmeth.3970#auth-2"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/nmeth.3970#auth-3"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/nmeth.3970#auth-4"}}}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working
